00085         public function __construct($url)
00086         {
00087                 // Set some default values.
00088                 $this->request_url = $url;
00089                 $this->method = HTTP_GET;
00090                 $this->request_headers = array();
00091                 $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
00092                 $this->request_body = '';
00093         }

00108         public function addHeader($key, $value)
00109         {
00110                 $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
00111         }
00112 
00121         public function removeHeader($key)
00122         {
00123                 if (isset($this->request_headers[$key]))
00124                 {
00125                         unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
00126                 }
00127         }

00138         {
00139                 $this->method = strtoupper($method);
00140         }

00151         {
00152                 $this->request_body = $body;

00157         // PREPARE, SEND, AND PROCESS REQUEST
00158 
00166         public function prepRequest()
00167         {
00168                 $this->addHeader('Expect', '100-continue');
00169                 $this->addHeader('Connection', 'close');
00170 
00171                 // Set default options.
00172                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
00173                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILETIME, true);
00174                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FRESH_CONNECT, true);
00175                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
00176                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
00177                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, true);
00178                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_MAXCONNECTS, 50);
00179                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CLOSEPOLICY, CURLCLOSEPOLICY_LEAST_RECENTLY_USED);
00180                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
00181                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 5);
00182                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
00183                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
00184                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 120);
00185                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 120);
00186                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, true);
00187                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_REFERER, $this->request_url);
00188                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, TARZAN_USERAGENT);
00189 
00190                 // Handle the encoding if we can.
00191                 if (extension_loaded('zlib'))
00192                 {
00193                         curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_ENCODING, '');
00194                 }
00195 
00196                 // Process custom headers
00197                 if (isset($this->request_headers) && count($this->request_headers))
00198                 {
00199                         $temp_headers = array();
00200 
00201                         foreach ($this->request_headers as $k => $v)
00202                         {
00203                                 $temp_headers[] = $k . ': ' . $v;
00204                         }
00205 
00206                         curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $temp_headers);
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 switch ($this->method)
00210                 {
00211                         case HTTP_PUT:
00212                                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
00213                                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
00214                                 break;
00215 
00216                         case HTTP_POST:
00217                                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
00218                                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
00219                                 break;
00220 
00221                         case HTTP_HEAD:
00222                                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, HTTP_HEAD);
00223                                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, 1);
00224                                 break;
00225 
00226                         default:
00227                                 curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->method);
00228                                 break;
00229                 }
00230 
00231                 return $this->curl_handle;
00232         }
00233 
00241         public function processResponse($curl_handle = null, $response = null)
00242         {
00243                 // Accept a custom one if it's passed.
00244                 if ($curl_handle && $response)
00245                 {
00246                         $this->curl_handle = $curl_handle;
00247                         $this->response = $response;
00248                 }
00249 
00250                 // Determine what's what.
00251                 $header_size = curl_getinfo($this->curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
00252                 $this->response_headers = substr($this->response, 0, $header_size);
00253                 $this->response_body = substr($this->response, $header_size);
00254                 $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($this->curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
00255                 $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($this->curl_handle);
00256 
00257                 // Parse out the headers
00258                 $this->response_headers = explode("\r\n\r\n", trim($this->response_headers));
00259                 $this->response_headers = array_pop($this->response_headers);
00260                 $this->response_headers = explode("\r\n", $this->response_headers);
00261                 array_shift($this->response_headers);
00262 
00263                 // Loop through and split up the headers.
00264                 $header_assoc = array();
00265                 foreach ($this->response_headers as $header)
00266                 {
00267                         $kv = explode(': ', $header);
00268                         $header_assoc[strtolower($kv[0])] = $kv[1];
00269                 }
00270 
00271                 // Reset the headers to the appropriate property.
00272                 $this->response_headers = $header_assoc;
00273                 $this->response_headers['_info'] = $this->response_info;
00274                 $this->response_headers['_info']['method'] = $this->method;
00275 
00276                 if ($curl_handle && $response)
00277                 {
00278                         return new TarzanHTTPResponse($this->response_headers, $this->response_body, $this->response_code);
00279                 }
00280         }
00281 
00289         public function sendRequest()
00290         {
00291                 $this->prepRequest();
00292                 $this->response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
00293                 $this->processResponse();
00294 
00295                 curl_close($this->curl_handle);
00296                 return $this->response;
00297         }
00298 
00306         public function sendMultiRequest($handles)
00307         {
00308                 // Initialize MultiCURL
00309                 $multi_handle = curl_multi_init();
00310 
00311                 // Loop through each of the CURL handles and add them to the MultiCURL request.
00312                 foreach ($handles as $handle)
00313                 {
00314                         curl_multi_add_handle($multi_handle, $handle);
00315                 }
00316 
00317                 $count = 0;
00318 
00319                 // Execute
00320                 do
00321                 {
00322                         $status = curl_multi_exec($multi_handle, $active);
00323                 }
00324                 while ($status == CURLM_CALL_MULTI_PERFORM  || $active);
00325 
00326                 // Retrieve each handle response
00327                 foreach ($handles as $handle)
00328                 {
00329                         if (curl_errno($handle) == CURLE_OK)
00330                         {
00331                                 $HTTPRequest = new TarzanHTTPRequest(null);
00332                                 $handles_post[] = $HTTPRequest->processResponse($handle, curl_multi_getcontent($handle));
00333                         }
00334                         else
00335                         {
00336                                 trigger_error(curl_error($handle));
00337                         }
00338                 }
00339 
00340                 return $handles_post;
00341         }

00354         public function getResponseHeader($header = null)
00355         {
00356                 if ($header)
00357                 {
00358                         return $this->response_headers[strtolower($header)];
00359                 }
00360                 return $this->response_headers;
00361         }
00362 
00370         public function getResponseBody()
00371         {
00372                 return $this->response_body;
00373         }
00374 
00382         public function getResponseCode()
00383         {
00384                 return $this->response_code;
00385         }
